Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Trezon collects, uses, and safeguards your personal information.

2. Information We Collect

We collect information that you provide to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you place an order. We may also collect information automatically through cookies and analytics tools.

3. How We Use Your Information

Your information is used to process orders, improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure a personalized shopping experience.

4. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share it with trusted third-party service providers for payment processing, order fulfillment, and analytics.

5. Security Measures

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no online transmission is 100% secure, and we encourage you to take precautions when sharing sensitive information.

6. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can modify your browser settings to disable cookies, but some site features may not function properly.

7. Your Rights

You have the right to access, update, or request deletion of your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

8. Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated revision date.

9. Contact Information

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

  • Email: trezon.in@gmail.com
  • Phone: +91 9201116970
